channel.title: The Project | Hugo Academic CV Theme

item.title: ðŸŒŸ The fifth week is the final breakthrough
item.description:
Main achievements

  1. I have almost completed my project on the analysis of medical images - it remains to complete the documentation
  2. I have mastered the new features of PyCharm for code profiling
  3. Improved the project interface, making it more user-friendly
  4. Conducted the first successful tests on real data

Technical Details

  • Implemented multithreaded image processing
  • Wrote automated tests for 85% of the codebase
  • Optimized memory usage, reducing consumption by 20%.%

Impressions

I suddenly discovered that:

  • Documenting the code turned out to be more exciting than I thought.
  • Profiling is like a detective investigation
  • Colleagues at the university started asking for advice on Python

Plans

  1. Prepare the final presentation
  2. Write an article about your decision for the university blog
  3. Start exploring the possibilities of publishing the project as open source
